Konya Blackout Ink Blue (Blinds By Post)

Konya Blackout Ink Blue Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion. Made to Measure Konya Blackout Ink Blue Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost

The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion. Made to Measure Konya Blackout Onyx Black Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost

Galaxy asc Blackout Ecru Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Part of our Galaxy Blackout range, where Advanced Solar Control (ASC) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Galaxy ASC Blackout Ecru Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX6001. A stylish, blackout pleated blind produced with an asc, solar reflective, backing.

blackoutblackout-perfect-fitperfect-fit

Luna Blackout Taupe Beige Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Luna Blackout Taupe Beige Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Luna Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Luna Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame. Made to measure Luna Blackout Taupe Beige Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX72001. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.

ThermoBlock Blackout Cream Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Our exclusive ThermoBlock range features soft neutral colours, on a polyester based blackout fabric. A cream electric roller blind easily brightens up the space, and our ThermoBlock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.   This cream blackout roller has a silver UV-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter,  a great option for hot offices or sunrooms. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more difficult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space.  Why not pair with our Smart Hub - control your blinds from the comfort of your phone while away, or pair with Amazon Alexa or Google Home Hub for a truly streamlined experience. At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years' experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This cream electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Product ID: DB-ERBX2140 Fabric Colour: Cream Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Silver UV-Reflecting Thermal Backing Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes ThermoBlock Blackout Cream Electric Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
